comment: Would love to see nexus 7 2013
Hey Jake, there should be two Nexus 7's if you swipe right. One is the old one (marked Nexus 7 2012), and one is the 2013 version.

Hasn't been updated, lacks key devices,  developer is unfriendly and doesn't care about users.	This app hasn't been updated in forever, requested LG G2 be added over 7 months ago. I repurchased to see if it was added but 15min refund button wasn't there. Requested a refund. Developer told me no, too bad, use one of the available device frames even if it isn't yours. Very unprofessional.
The list of devices are clearly listed in the description. https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/134336 also clearly mentions you can't receive a second refund for the app.

title: Awesome
comment: Just what I was looking for!

title: That extra bit of detail
comment: This app adds a nice touch of class to screenshots. It's amazing the difference a simple thing like this makes. If you share or post lots of screenshots, getting this app is a no-brainer. The workflow is completely unobtrusive also. Simply snap a screenie, from it's notification share to this app, then from this app's notification share to your app of choice. Also, the app smartly detects the orientation of the screenshot and rotates the frame accordingly. A few popular devices are missing (like the Galaxy S 4, Notes 2 and 3 and any Motorola phones) but I hope they're added soon.

title: Prateek - please add Galaxy Note 3
comment: Please update app to include newer phones, especially the Samsung Galaxy Note 3! (white?!)  3 stars for now.  5 stars if updated to include white Note 3. Thanks Prateek. Keep up the good work!
